resource.chars:
H.M.S. BULWARK 
CHANNEL FLEET 
26.10.08
Dear Sir Archibald 
I have received your acknowledgement 
of my letter. The same post brought me 
a letter from Mr Bernacchi calling my 
attention to a review of the <u>Physical <\u> Volume 
of the Expedition published in the Times 
of the 22nd. inst.
The Reviewer is the same person who 
Criticised the meteorological work and it 
would appear that he continues to be 
animated with the same spirit.
I do not know who he is, but I write 
to ask if you would be good enough to 
direct that a copy of the Physical Volume 
shall be sent to me - By some oversight 
(possibly uncertainty of address) I have not 
yet received a copy.
In a passing glimpse of Mr Bernacchi’s Copy 
some weeks ago I saw a remark
